txt.en: 'Scattered throughout this cursed place are bits and baubles that can be sold topside so that our small settlement can afford supplies and food. While this is dangerous work, it is necessary for our people's survival.\n\n'If you are brave enough, could you scour the area and recover some of these objects?'
Return to Yâshri with the valuable goods.\n\nYâshri can be found just north of Ghâr Mejet.
Return to Yâshri with the valuable goods
Yâshri has requested that you help recover items of value from Ghâr Mejet.

'Your work is excellent, and these valuable goods will go a long way to support our cause. I cannot express my thanks greatly enough, as now my family and friends have food to eat for the coming months.'
Find and recover valuable goods scattered amongst the Dead in Ghâr Mejet.
